name: Kyuukyoku no Sokoban
description: Kyuukyoku no Soukoban - 3D Puzzle & Cinema is the first Playstation game of the classic puzzler based on the gaffer in charge of a warehouse needing to get the stock correctly stashed. Unfortunately the stock can only be pushed around requiring a bit of lateral thinking to get the warehouse in order.

name: Sokoban Revenge SX-68K: User no Gyakushuu-hen
Frog Smashers
description: A local multiplayer brawler game about hitting frogs with baseball bats.

name: Pangya M
description: A redevelopment version of PangYa Mobile. Planned to release as a cross-platform game between the mobile version and PC version in NCSoft Purple platform.

name: Jumanji: The Mobile Game
description:
Jumanji: The Mobile Game is an app based game released in late 2017 to coincide with the release of Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle. The game was available until the app finally closed on May 24th, 2018.

Unplayed for decades, the legendary game always finds a way! Jumanji is now a competitive mobile game! Challenge your friends and new rivals in a fun new board game!

Choose your favorite character, build your deck of unique ability cards and start your journey to save the whole world from Jumanji! Defeat other players in the treacherous world of Jumanji!

name: The Godfather: Family Dynasty
description:
For the first time ever, The Godfather officially comes to you as a brand new mobile game in an untold tale of money, power, and corruption. Don Vito Corleone has summoned you to enter the notorious criminal underworld of 1945 and become his devoted Underboss. As second in command to the Godfather, YOU will be the one to carry out the Corleones’ dirty deeds and fight for the honor and respect of the most powerful Family in New York City.

Building a legacy won’t be a simple undertaking. As your wealth and influence grow, unfortunately, so does your list of dedicated enemies. Keep a watchful eye over your empire, as even a trusted ally could turn against you. When hostilities arise, you will have to use strength, intimidation, and intelligence to protect your assets, as well as your honor. Recruit your Capos and train them well, for vengeance is yours.

Every well-respected Boss needs a mansion. Once you take control of your domain, you must find lucrative ways to enhance your resources and increase your wealth. Blood is a big expense, but if necessary, be ready to engage in deadly warfare. Remember to keep your friends close and your enemies closer— you never know who will use your information for their own personal gains.

Can you maintain your loyalty to The Godfather? Once you pledge your allegiance to the Don, there is no turning back. Remember, it’s not personal...strictly business.

name: BS Nichibutsu Mahjong
description: BS Nichibutsu Mahjong is a Downloadable 2-part Soundlink game for the Satellaview that was broadcast between January 26, 1997 and April 12, 1997. The players compete in a "Mahjong Competition" game for total score. Enviromental sound seems to be used as audio broadcasting.

name: World Stadium EX
description: The first in a series of cartoon-style graphics baseball video games by Namco for PlayStation.

name: World Stadium 4
description: A PlayStation baseball game by Namco with real Japanese teams and players and a cartoon art style.

name: Logan's Treasure
description:
Logan's treasure is a retro platform game.Collect all key on each level to open the Treasure chest.
Collect all 40 keys on each levels, and find the exit door to open chest

name: Dimension Hunter VR
description: Dimension Hunter allows you to immerse yourself in this tongue in cheek, over the top, retro-arcade experience, with a unique choice of free or railed movement. Fast paced, hardcore, fluid gameplay mechanics with a unique, and yet familiar, comic book style of carnage and gore.

name: Gravity Fighters
description: Physics-based space battles for 1-4 players. Harness the power of gravity!

name: It Moves
description: It Moves is a horror game that will try to scare you without too many of the typical "screamers", instead relying on atmosphere and suspense. You'll be solving puzzles along the way, and encountering all manner of not-so-friendly creatures.

name: Fleet Scrapper
description: A physics based space exploration game driven by the story of a young pilot that is working for "The Company" and fleeing from the Interstellar Authority.

name: Pongis
description: Pongis is a simple and fun ball game that will make you happy forever

name: Rockford: The Arcade Game + Crystal Raider
3D-Laby
description:
In 3D-Laby players navigate a randomly generated maze in the first-person perspective. Players can look at an overhead map of the maze.

The end of the maze is marked by a large A on a wall. Once players reach the end of the maze they are given a "score" which is how many steps it took to reach it.

name: Exit Path
description: Exit Path is a 2D platformer game. Players control a runner who is met with various obstacles such as sawblades, spikes, and swinging axes in an attempt to escape the obstacle course and become free.

name: Phileas Fogg's Balloon Battles
description: On the way trying to get round the world in 80 days, Mr Phileas Fogg has stopped to help the Allies against the enemy. To help, Phileas is going up in the air in his hot-air balloon and mapping the enemy territory as well as locating and bombing enemy shacks. Using High Pressure Thrust, the winds, hydrogen gas, and sandbags, Phileas can adjust his height and direction to map and bomb enemy shacks as well as avoiding obstacles and Musketeers firing cannons and muskets. The longer the day goes on and gets warmer the balloon rises and falls quicker.

name: 'Er*Bert
description: A cubic-domain game in which you must change the colour of the grid and avoid the gorilla, balls and snake. Starring : Crazy Er*Bert Supporting cast : Boris the Gorilla, Coily the Snake Featuring : Cascading balls, deadly discs, balmy bananas, rotating rota-hats Great fun in this arcade-style classic!

name: Dance Dance Revolution X3 VS 2ndMix
description: Dance Dance Revolution X3 is a music video game, and a part of the Dance Dance Revolution series. The arcade version of DDR X3 was revealed by Konami on June 2, 2011. The sequel to Dance Dance Revolution X2, X3 began public beta testing on June 8, 2011. Promotional information for the game revealed the full name for the game, called Dance Dance Revolution X3 VS 2ndMix due to the new "2ndMix" mode in the game. It was released in Japan on November 16, 2011 for dedicated cabinets and November 30, 2011 for upgrade kits, and December 16, 2011 in Asia.

name: Disney Magical Dice: The Enchanted Board Game
description: The most wondrous board game is now ready to be played on your PC and Mac. Play Disney Magical Dice: The Enchanted Board Game on your computer to experience your favorite Disney characters like never before. Take turns in real-time PvP against Disney fans and players from all over the globe as you battle it out for money, glory, and Disney characters.

name: Maze Invaders
description: You control a character navigating an ever-changing maze, and must collect all the fruits while shooting or evading mostly abstract enemies.

name: SuperLite 1500 Series: The Curling
description: Software about throwing stones toward the circle drawn on the 40m destination, was reproduced sport "curling" to compete the distance of the stone from the center of the circle to pop. 6 Select the operation team from the team, equipped with a 1-player mode for the remaining 5 warfare team and brute force, the two battle mode you are making full use of intelligence and technology unfolds the offense and defense. You easily can enjoy a simple operability.

name: Space King
description: Space King is an early arcade game from Konami. It is the first non-Breakout clone the company produced, instead being a clone of Taito's Space Invaders.

name: Kaite Shabette Hajimeyou! Monster Farm DS
Teddy and Bo: Search for the Dream Catcher
Adiboo & Paziral's Secret
description: Adiboo & Paziral's Secret is a 3D action adventure game with 12 levels. Players will take control of Adiboo and help rescue the citizens of peaceful Tonies Island from the threat of mysterious island. The mysterious island has a leader named Paziral. To unveil his secret player must come across five levels: volcano, lagoon, forest, temple, and metal island. The game is divided into platform, racing, and arcade stages.

name: VG II: The Bout of Cabalistic Goddess
description:
After the six girls of the Jahana group have concluded their Variable Geo tournament, a girl named Kotoe Kashima, who happens to be the childhood rival of Reimi Jahana, has organized a new tournament, called "Bout of Cabalistic Goddess". The tournament is once again sponsored by a chain of restaurants, with famous martial artists working there as waitresses. The player chooses one of the six girls of the Jahana group and has once again to defeat all the others in battle before fighting Kotoe and her bodyguards.

The Bout of Cabalistic Goddess is the second game in the Variable Geo series. It follows the same gameplay template as its predecessor: the player has to fight the other girls in a pre-determined order, winning two rounds out of three. There are five new girls to fight in this sequel. As before, the defeated fighters undergo various humiliating treatments of sexual nature. There are now three erotic scenes per girl, but it's possible to see them only after winning the whole battle, not one scene per round, as it was the case in the first game.

name: V.G.: Variable Geo
description: Variable Geo is a Japanese 2D fighting game / eroge developed and published by TGL under their Giga brand. The game focuses on an all-female martial arts competition where participants are required to promote various family restaurants by acting as waitresses when not fighting. Takahiro Kimura was responsible for designing the characters

name: Chacha Fighter V
description: A vamp on Street Fighter V, this homebrew\Doujin created game has the ladies showing off their fighting prowess. Several versions and improvements on the game were made over time.

name: Armored Trooper Votoms: Dead Ash
description: Armored Trooper Votoms: Dead Ash is an Action game, developed and published by Family Soft, which was released in Japan in 1991.

name: 2069 AD
description: Japanese adult adventure game for the PC-98

name: A-Ressha de Ikou 4
description:
Not released in Western countries, Take the A-Train IV is the fourth game in the Japanese-made A-Train series, directly following its most popular installment, known in the Western world as simply A-Train.

The game plays very similarly to its predecessor, including the interface, the core gameplay system (managing a company, purchasing trains, building railways, influencing city growth, transporting goods, etc.), and characteristic features such as a day/night system, weather effects, season changes, etc., all of which influence the player's chances to earn money from his networks.

A new feature is the possibility to build roads, acquire buses, and plan bus routes.

The game offers four different scenarios: a medium-sized metropolitan area, an industrial area, a rural area, and a huge high-tech urban area. Each poses different challenges to the player.

name: A-Train: Trains, Power, Money
description:
Although trains are your primary source of income in the beginning of the game, A-Train is not about building trains exclusively. By utilizing the train industry as well as buses and subways, it is up to you to manage an efficient transportation system for passengers and freighting companies. Everything you do must be well thought out because you're out to make a profit.

As soon as you've earned the adequate funds, you have to start making investments. With your money you can buy and sell all types of land and businesses. If you think you're lucky enough, you may opt to play the stock market. Purchased land can be developed in a variety of ways, such as in the development of offices, apartments, hotels, factories, golf courses, and so on. It is up to you to build the largest financial empire humanly possible.

As the city develops, new businesses will spring up, such as stadiums, high rise office blocks, and ski resorts. You can also build your own businesses, the success of which will depend on the local population, the presence of competing businesses, and even the changes of the seasons, among other factors.

name: Genghis Khan: Aoki Ookami to Shiroki Mejika IV
description: A historical simulation game created by Koei in 1998. The fourth and final series of the Genghis Khan series, in 1999.

name: A-7
description: Marketed as the 20th anniversary title for the A-Train series, it revives the "urban development" gameplay that had been missing since A-Train 5.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou 2001
description: A-Ressha de Ikou 2001 is a second version of the sixth part of the A-Train series. This is a train management simulation on Playstation 2 that gives you the controls of a train company. It's up to you to make the right decisions to grow your business and put it at the top of the industry.

name: A5: A-Ressha de Ikou 5
description: Released in December 1996 in Japan for Windows 95, this was the first A-Train game to use 3D graphics with a PowerVR graphics accelerator.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou Z: Mezase! Tairiku Oudan
description: Released in May 1999 in Japan for the PS1, this was a re-imagining of the first game's setting and objectives, using the 3D engine of A5.

name: Mindframe Arena
description: Lead your Tec team on an epic journey through the worlds of Mindframe Arena

name: Cho Ren Sha 68K
description: Cho Ren Sha 68K is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up in which the player takes control of an unnamed spaceship to fight against a horde of enemy spacecraft on a giant and seemingly endless ring-shaped space station. The game features a loop system whereby after defeating the last boss of stage 0 in loops 1, 3, 5 and 7 the player starts at the beginning of stage 1 with an increase on the game's difficulty level. The game features a total of seven stages and eight loops in total.

name: Disney Hidden Worlds
description: Hidden Worlds is a game created by Playdom for mobile phones. It is a hidden object game, in which you select hidden objects in various scenes from Disney movies to progress through the game.

name: IMVU
description: IMVU is an instant messaging client and online social entertainment website that uses 3D avatars to meet new people, chat, create, and play games.

name: Tokimeki Mahjong Paradise: Koi no Tenpai Beat
Tokimeki Mahjong Graffiti: Toshishita no Tenshi Tachi
Tokimeki Mahjong Paradise Special: Koi no Tenpai Beat
Nightruth Voice Selection: Radio Drama Hen
Making of Nightruth II: Voice Selection
Gonta no Okiraku Daibouken
description: Gonta no Okiraku Daibouken is an Adventure game, published by Lay-Up, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Space Chaser 2000
description: Space Chaser 2000 is a remake of the classic Taito arcade machine that features the Original mode with the arcade graphics and a new Arrangement mode with enhanced graphics, new backgrounds and vibration function.

name: Raimais
description: Raimais is a maze chase arcade game released in April 1988 in Japan. The object of the game is to drive your vehicle around a maze in order to clear the maze of dots while avoiding the enemy. The game consists of 32 mazes total plus boss fights.

name: MapleStory M
description: MapleStory M is a mobile MMORPG set in the whimsical and colorful world of MapleStory. Players embark on thrilling adventures, battling monsters, completing quests, and interacting with fellow adventurers in real-time. With its charming 2D graphics, extensive character customization, and social features, MapleStory M brings the beloved MMORPG experience to the palm of your hand.

name: Eburnean
description:
Wanna fight bosses that do silly puns in an arena full of paint ?
Well, we have that ! Pick among the 8 weird, but unique... let's say "heroes", then you are ready to kick asses !

name: Sage Elegy
description: Sage Elegy is a semi-rendering role-playing game in which the young girl and Alchemy perform daily. You will play as a young girl who entered the Alchemy Academy. In the stream of college life you find "What we are coveting is what we later spit.

name: Project Visitor
description:
Project Visitor is, at its heart, a hybrid MMO game with both FPS and RTS characteristics. It comes from the days when we use to call them PSW's (Persistent State Worlds). Nowadays most MMO games are really just PSC (Persistent State Characters) where essentially its just your character that changes and is saved. In Project Visitor you build the world around you, you attack others and the lands they have built and the whole world is saved to the database. Also the world continues to grow and battles happen, lands are lost, gained, etc even while your offline. To maintain your land you have to be involved, join a protective group called a MDN, own, mine, defend, survive! 
 
Previously known as 10Six, it was Sega's first foray into MMO's, a persistent online RTS where players signed up for one of four mega-corporations aiming to conquer the rogue planet Visitor, which has entered the solar system and contains a treasure of valuable resources. 
 
Players construct and capture mining sites, construct defenses and NPC units to help defend and attack in a fairly traditional RTS mode, but much of the game also consists of player on player combat in first or third person modes, similar to Battlezone or Planetside. 
 
The server infrastructure was designed to be able to handle a million simultaneous players and was hosted through SegaSoft's Heat.net, but never saw player counts that high. After failing to attract a sufficiently large audience Sega shut down the game in June 2002, offering refunds to anybody with subscription time left. 
 
A community effort to relaunch the game was started soon after the servers were taken down. Conundrum Studios was formed in late 2002, and the game was relaunched under the name Project Visitor in 2003.

name: GP Bikes
description: GP Bikes is a realistic motorcycle simulator, based on a scratch built physics engine that accurately simulates motorcycle dynamics and setup options.

name: Enchain
description: Grapple, throw, and gib your fellow undead and navigate with masterful speed as you smash towards whatever sent you to the depths of the afterlife in this retro-inspired FPS action platformer.

name: Courtyard Broomball
description: Courtyard Broomball is a retro parody of the Backyard Sports series from the late 90's. The sport played in the game is based on the real-life sport of quidditch. Choose from over 80 characters to make your fantasy team, and take on the rest of the world in the sport of broomball.

name: ACB Total 2010/2011
description: ACB Total 2010/2011 is the official basketball simulator game for ACB.

name: The Last Night : The first invation
description: Survive the invasion and find a way to eliminate them. This time, darkness will be your best friend.

name: In Torment: The Case of the Drawing Girl
Ooh, Aah, & You: Fetch-a-Fruit
description: Ooh and Aah's: Fetch-a-fruit is a game from 2005 originally published on the Playhouse Disney website. In the game you are supposed to draw a vine through fruits that are on the screen, while on the Easy difficulty you have to draw a vine through all the fruits that are on the screen, while on Medium, you only need to draw through 3 up to 5 fruits that are on the screen. The game has 5 rounds that between each other will change the monkey, if you started on Aah, the next will be Ooh and if you started with Ooh, the next is Aah

name: A Street Story
description: A Street Story is an interactive story in which you play a gangster in the suburbs from Paris, France. Discover a troubled world mixing gangsters, cops and terrorists. Choose your own path among those shady characters and try to survive!

name: Qanga
description: QANGA is a science fiction game about exploration and survival in the solar system. Synchronize your consciousness in a cyborg provided from ICLab's Industry labs and explore this universe!

name: Pittsfield
description: Vina wakes up and finds herself in a small town called Pittsfield. While she is anxious to look for her missing boyfriend and a way out of this strange place, curiosity got the better of her. Nothing is normal about this town, but there's more to just that when Vina gets killed and time starts looping.

name: Outside World: Remembered
description: As her journey continues, Kyrsten not only has to solve puzzles and find a way home, but to deal with strange appearances of long lost friends as well.

name: As If Dreaming When You're Wide Awake
description: As If is a first person narrative game portraying issues revolving around mental health. Experience the life of Matthew as he struggles to reach his dreams and wishes. Step into his shoes. Look from his eyes. Listen to the voices. Feel his frustrations. Packaged in artistic symbolisms and realistic grit.

name: 祛魅·教化（祛魅1）
description:
他，励精图治两年铸大作；他，不懈前行一人绘华章。 
一部国人自创的RPG小清新大作，商业游戏浪潮中的一股清流，带给你婉如初恋般的情愫，带回你青涩年华时代的记忆。 
精品游戏『祛魅·教化（祛魅1）』正在发售！

name: Spaceguy 2
description: Dangerous aliens are coming to Earth. Only you can stop them!

name: Hidden Object: Tomorrowland - The Land of Machines
Omega Commando
description:
Battle an onslaught of robots to save humanity from annihilation. 
Use advanced weapons and technology to complete 3 pulse pounding missions. 
High intensity third-person shooter action.

name: Hidden Object: Sakura Garden
description: Search 20 Japanese-themed scenes for hidden objects. The lists of items to find can be set to word, picture, or silhouette.

name: Amaranthine Voyage: Legacy of the Guardians
Hidden Object: Marionettes Dolls on Strings
Hidden Object: Let the Dogs Out
Hidden Object: Age of the Dinosaurs
Hidden Object: Journey into the Wilderness
Hidden Object: I Love My Job
Hidden Object: The World of Icarus
Hidden Object: Garden Party
description: A search, find and click game, where the object is to find hidden objects through garden themed scenes. Choose exactly how you want to search for items. Find items by their picture, silhouette, word, or random combination. Play casual rounds with no time pressure, or more challenging timed modes.

name: Roast Party
description: Roast Party is an online party game that you can play with your friends! The goal of Roast Party is to write creative roasts on the pictures submitted by other players based on the prompts given. After roasts are submitted players will then vote on their favorite roasts anonymously!

name: OpenSpades
description: OpenSpades is a clone of Ace of Spades 0.75, which is a free online first-person shooter created by Ben Aksoy, featuring fully destructible terrain and plenty of game modes (including the well-known Capture the Flag) created by the community.

name: 7,62 Hard Life
description: 7,62 Hard Life is a fan-made enhanced version of the original tactical sim 7,62 High Calibre. Its development started almost immediately after the original game released in 2007. Over 50 people worked on the project in total. We hope you'll enjoy this version, that is available to all owners of the original game on Steam at no extra cost.

name: Trinoline: Genesis
description: Trinoline Genesis continues with all new stories for the original and side heroines of the original Trinoline!

name: Rite of Passage: Hide and Seek
Mind Trap
description: Mind Trap is a Twilight Zone "Inspired" 4 Episode psychological thriller series. Where the player must explore and follow the clues as the stories unfolds around them.

name: Meteorfall: Krumit's Tale
description:
Krumit's Tale, the second game in the Meteorfall universe, is a brand new take on the deckbuilding roguelike genre. Dungeons are laid out in a 3x3 grid, and you'll need to use your items wisely to survive. You'll build your deck and earn perks as you fight your way to the Uberlich. Do you have what it takes to defeat the Uberlich?

Battle the likes of sozzled bearbearians and nuke-addled snotwolves to protect our glowing green world from the sweaty hands of the Uberlich! Krumit's Tale involves the same core deck building mechanics as Meteorfall: Journeys and the same cast of overly optimistic heroes, but expands the ‘swipe’ mechanic into a dynamic grid based system. This means more depth and longevity – our heroes will have to choose perks to complement their deck-building strategy and carefully manage the board if they wish to triumph.

name: Final Cut: Death on the Silver Screen
Hidden Object: Fairy Tale
description: Hello, hidden object fans! Are you ready for the brand new hidden object story games? If you're a girl, then you'll enjoy becoming a real fairy tale princess in this awesome hidden object mystery! Welcome to the hidden object world of your imagination – you will discover enchanted things, beautiful fairies, and many other magical items in this Hidden Objects Fairy Tale! Download free and let the magic happen! The best fairy tale games are waiting for you!

name: Hidden Object: The Birds from Aviary
TomeNet
description: TomeNET is a multiplayer realtime roguelike game, based on and somewhat similar to MAngband and ToME, and also featuring some Zangband and Cthulu Angband monsters.

name: Weird Rituals in the Ancient Temples
Young Wife Yuka's Good Day to Cheat
Avariavs
description:
In Avariavs, players choose a party of 3 heroes to battle against an opponent’s party. During battle, opposing players choose their actions simultaneously and then witness the mayhem of their decisions. Combat rages on until one winner reigns victorious by decimating their opponent’s HP to zero.

Be warned however, matches that do not conclude promptly may be subject to judgement…

name: Slam Land
description:
Dunk your friends to amaze a giant blue man in SLAM LAND, a magnificent new 4-player couch competitive fighting/party game by Bread Machine Games.

Select your fighter and punch, grab and DOUNK! your way through five modes, ten levels, and a surreal world overseen by a benevolent (?) giant whose only amusement in life is to witness sporting and majestic slams.

Win his favor or get stuffed trying!

name: Off the Record: The Italian Affair
Off the Record: The Final Interview
Off the Record: The Linden Shades
Off The Record: The Art of Deception
13 Minutes of Light
description: When your girlfriend gets on the Virgin Commercial spaceflight to start her career as a teacher at Mars University, you realise the relationship has... a bit of a challenge. Will your penmanship be enough to keep the relationship warm?

name: 1/2 Summer
description:
During the summer vacation, Kaname was asked to help out at his family's inn in Tohoku. He had expected it to be a refreshing change from the sweltering heat in Tokyo, but when he arrived at the train station with his younger sister Kazuha, he was surprised to find that the town he once lived in, now have a huge school built in it. Boarding a crowded bus and traveling out of the city to Kusanagi Inn, he was relieved to see the familiar country scenery once again. But why are there schoolgirls in the inn?

The owner told him that they were students from Jinza Gakuen in the city, but due to an incident they couldn’t stay in their dormitory, so she let them stay at the inn for the summer. That’s why he was needed there: there was a need for more staff to look after the girls. Furthermore, he had one more thing on his mind. The mischievous Zashiki-warashi that lived in the inn, because of whom he ends up returning to the countryside for good.

name: 12-sai: Koi Suru Diary
description: 12-sai: Koi Suru Diary is a visual novel for the Nintendo 3DS and is based off the manga 12-sai.

name: 12nin no Onna Kyoushi
description: Main character transfers to an elite boys' school where his uncle becomes a president. They decide to use women teachers as a bait to attract the best students. For that protagonist develops a plan to train teachers into slaves.

name: 11wol Sonyeon
description: A mystery-adventure game about an obsessive, stalker romance.

name: 1001-Kai-me no Aoi Tsuki
description: A visual novel developed by Chainsou.

name: Metal Slug Revolution
description: Metal Slug Revolution was a mobile shooting game with RPG elements, such as the ability to customize slugs. The servers were closed 22nd January 2016.

name: Escape
description:
Escape is a single player, shareware, 3D first person shooter.

The plot sees the player escape from jail to stop Shao Kang, who is using alien warriors in his attempt to take control of Earth. The ultimate goal is, of course, to kill him. The game is keyboard controlled and has five levels with multiple weapons and power ups to collect.

name: Dragon Ball Z: XKeeperZ
description: A 4-on-4 battle game in the Dragon Ball Z universe.

name: Petite Wife Devotes Herself to You
Let's Cook
description: Do you want to manage the restaurant together with your friends? You can try the restaurant simulation with your friends online or locally. You can enter with a maximum of 16 people. You can play alone if you want (it will be difficult.).

name: Custer's Revenge in Gensoukyou
description: Parody of the 1982 Atari game, Custer's Revenge

name: You Experience 365 Days of Being a Girl in This Simulator Game
Apartment Life to Cuck and Impregnate Neighboring Busty Married Women
GF Becomes SexCare Manager of Baseball Club: Cucked In Sportsmen's Sex
Touhou Haou III
description: This is a "VS-ish" fighting game that features Touhou Project characters.

name: Decaying Flowers
description: It is a simulation RPG with Debt Repayments and Adventure. Lobelia, who loves play to mentally hunt down a girl and take control of her, keeps an eye on Marpel struggling with her debt...

name: I Picked Up a Mysterious Smartphone That You Can Change Everything as You Like
Dezaemon Kids!
description: Dezaemon Kids! is a title in the Dezaemon series that allows players to create their own shoot-'em-up games. The players can design levels and enemies by themselves or choose from a number of presets, as well as compose musical themes for the levels. The game has a simplified colorful interface which makes it targeted for younger audience. It also boasts fully-voiced tutorial, a large amount of sample data, a horizontal scroll option, and 2-player simultaneous play option. The second game disc contains 102 sample games created in Dezaemon Plus.

name: Miscrits: Volcano Island
description: Volcano Island expands the world of miscrits with new areas, creatures, bosses and the conclusion to the story.

name: Miscrits: World of Creatures
description: Capture, evolve, and battle mysterious creatures called Miscrits.

name: Nova Empire
description: Build up a Space Empire and establish control of the Galaxy and the Universe! Nova Empire is a multiplayer space game in which the aim is to build your empire and conquer the galaxy in epic space battles against your rivals with other allies worldwide!

name: Hylics 2
description:
Hylics 2 uses the RPG format to deliver a procession of surreal images and sounds.

Explore 3D environments, stopping occasionally for lavishly animated turn-based combat encounters. Deploy a plethora of items and abilities ranging from the humble burrito to the mighty Bombo-genesis. Use your dodge-roll and air-dash to move freely and discover hidden TVs and Cabinets.

Help Wayne and his crew accumulate power, that they might oppose the minions of Gibby, who seek to reconstitute their long-presumed-annihilated master.

name: Inspector Ooh: The Great Monkey Detective
description: This is a 2005 game originally aired on the Playhouse Disney website, the game was inspired on the Ooh and Aah's bumper series called Inspector Ooh. In the game you need to find 3 things hidden in the stack of 3 pictures, you have 20 seconds to do each picture, but if you click on a banana, you gain more time. Also Ooh and give you a hint

name: Cosmos Quest II: To Find a Sun
Cosmos Quest V: The New Beginning
Cosmos Quest IV: The Ayatolian March
Cosmos Quest III: The Mines of Isagor
Fap Titans
description:
Have you ever dreamed of conquering monsters, being the hero of the kingdom and having a busty babe by your side? Fap Titans Delivers!

The world has been overrun by terrible monsters - and it needs you to find slutty heroes that will bring peace and love to the land! As our leader, you must horde your bitches and vanquish the terrors. With the help of big tittied warriors, build your army to help destroy the dark forces and become the Titan.

name: Late Night Wanderer
description: An atmospheric game about a late night walk home.

name: JailBreaker
description:
Set in a grim totalitarian futuristic society,a rather physically well-endowed red-headed female thief named Shlla is captured by the guards and put in prison.
The gameplay mostly consists of exploring the prison and its surroundings, picking up clues, talking to characters to gain information, etc. There are no real puzzles in the game; most of the time it is just necessary to initiate certain conversations to trigger events or pick up specific items for later usage. There are also some action-based segments in the game, including a few combat sequences, situations which require quick movement, and timed events.

name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: VR Experience
StarGather
description: Two Spaceships together fighting in the space

name: Mad Libs
description: Fill in the blankspots in sentences and share them with your friends!

name: Jagged Alliance: Complete Edition
description:
This compilation includes:

- Jagged Alliance Gold
- Jagged Alliance: Back in Action
- Jagged Alliance: Crossfire
- Jagged Alliance 2 Gold
- Jagged Alliance: Flashback

name: "I'm sorry! I'll do whatever you want!" She said...
Cuckoldry Festival: Former Pro Wrestler Mother Trifled by the Huge Dick of her Son's Friend
So How About Swapping Our Wives and Disciplining Them?
Three Nights Four Days! Very H Camping School With Teachers All Missing
Brother Cat: The Legend of Super Cat
Fake Lay
description: Live out your wildest fantasies in the kinkiest clicker/dating sim ever! Disguise yourself as a cab driver, film director, masseur or any other job that can get you laid! While you're at it, take some nudes of the girls you seduce, film some smoking-hot scenes and use them to make big money!

name: Mononofu Battle Princess of White Lily
Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu 2018
description: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2018 will include “Pawafuru Festival,” a mode that has been included with past entries where players battle through a tournament against Success characters of successive generations. The setting is an extravagant passenger boat called the “Queen of Festival.”

name: Ultra Adventure Go Go Osawari Island
Queen's Tales: Sins of the Past
Kaerazu no Mori
description:
Kaezaru no Mori: The game is a horror adventure that begins in a small town high school when Tatsuya the main hero and his 2 friends decide to enter deep into the forest in the search of his missing classmate. But things won't be as easy as they though since they will find ghosts, corpses and other perils until they can survive that night.

The gameplay as in most visual novels in choosing one of the possible answers to advance, as a peculiar thing in some choices there is a time limit, but the game allows the player to use items to advance through the game, also there are choices that will leave to different endings, and the player's character can also die in most of them.

name: Space Mouse: 35th Anniversary Edition
description: Guide Alice, cat astronaut extraordinaire, to the top of the building without being caught by the vicious Space Mice. The original version of this vertically-scrolling maze game was released in September 1981 for the PC-8001. It was designed by Takanari Suzuki, Japan’s first star game creator.

name: Deep Town
description:
A science fiction strategy game where you play as an AI, with a sole purpose to Mine, Craft and Replicate.

On your journey you will construct underground buildings, invent tools, explore archeological and geological history of your planet, and dig deep.

name: Hardway: Endless Road Builder
description: Endless road building with a brand new mechanics. Build from left or right. Connect islands using roads and bridges in a fast arcade style. Track your favourite car and drive through unique worlds. Be aware of different obstacles including moving islands, lighthouses and monsters.

name: Digby Jump
description:
Digby loves to jump - who would have thought!
Collect themes, trails and all of Digby's friends - then you see how high you can get in this super fun, one tap endless jumper.

name: Diamond Quest
description: Diamond Quest is a clone of Boulder Dash. You have to find all diamonds before the time runs out, but be careful not getting crushed by a boulder. Finding a "T" will give you a lot of bonus time.

name: Amenity's Life
description:
Anthropomorphism × Anthropomorphization Personification Everyday with a beautiful girl

A slapstick story that begins with becoming girls thing.
Various things such as smartphone, headphones, robot vacuum cleaner etc which cant usually leave became girls and suddenly became a harem state!What?
Appealing to try using yourself, common sense does not pass in the first place, childhood and adult older sister of small size, etc are also various!
Suddenly enjoy enjoying the butterfly life with heroines and things thrown into extraordinary daily life.

Straight love...
This love affair with the heroines is a direct ball game. From sticking to love patterns among parties on a one-to-one basis, from conflicting feelings to each other, even expressions that only confesses to a lover after a relationship, there is embarrassing empathy that can be shown as a straightforward romance and a straight game deliver happiness.

name: Delinquent Girlfriend Is Made Into a Masochist Femswine by Disgusting Bad Friend
Escape From A Ruined Hospital with a Girl Who Lost Emotion
World Apart
description: World Apart is an Episodic VR Adventure. Every World Apart episode will deliver a new world to explore, each with it’s own unique story and interact-able environment. Delve deep into the conspiracy, uncover the secrets as you aid scientists, and save your world.

name: KFC The Hard Way
description: Colonel Sanders is known the world over as a fried chicken genius because of KFC. But his genius also drives him to ever more startling heights. His latest endeavour is an escape room he engineered in virtual reality. This was the clearest way to communicate exactly what is expected when it comes to making his fried chicken. And he was at last able to give himself the powers he always wanted. Powers like laser eyes and a robot companion. Enter at your own peril, and see if you have what it takes to make KFC Colonel Sanders’ way, the Hard Way.

name: Mirror Layers
description: Mirror Layers is a social horror game which focuses on mysterious riddles and cooperation with other players. Visit the other side of the mirror and solve brain-teasing riddles; join "Propaganda", a mysterious social network made to let you cooperate with other players; and unveil the secrets and horrors of Chandran apartments.

name: Disney's Lilo & Stitch: Hawaiian Adventure
description: Stitch has landed in Hawaii and it's up to Lilo to show him how to be a good citizen and help him learn what ʻohana, or "family", is all about. Players can learn to hula, help Stitch find gizmos, and play seven different games based on the movie.

name: Graffiti Smash
description: Slingshot to paint surfaces and get power boosts. Enjoy PvP matches via a real-time online battle system. Co-op with friends to clear dungeons and beat bosses. Enjoy a script of 1 million plus words that tells stories about the bonds and dynamics between people in a post-apocalyptic world!

name: Hidden Object: The Luck of the Irish
Hidden Object: The Mystery of Zion
Motto! Stitch! DS: Rhythm de Rakugaki Daisakusen
description: This game is a sequel to Disney Stitch Jam, exclusive to Japan.

name: Spelling Blizzard
description: Spelling Blizzard is an Educational game developed by Bright Star Technology and published by Sierra On-Line Inc in 1994.

name: Taleans Hansel and Gretel story
description: While the boy Hansel and his sister girl Gretel were walking in the dark forest, they lost each other. In "Taleans Hansel and Gretel" you will have to help them find each other. On the screen you will see a forest glade, at the different ends of which our characters are standing. For our heroes to meet each other, they need to walk along the path that goes through the clearing. But the path is broken, and you need to restore its integrity by moving the elements on the screen and putting them in the right place. As soon as you finish this task, the heroes will run along the path and meet up.

name: Monster Galaxy: The Zodiac Islands
description: Battle & tame hundreds of wild monsters in this epic roleplaying adventure, already beloved by over 2 million players!

name: Hidden Object: Fairies of the Frost
Xenogunner
description: Blast your way past a large variety of bosses, from an imposing robot dragon to a fierce mercenary in a flying car, and save the universe from the evil Xenogunner in this intense boss-focused run-and-gun platformer!

name: Kim the Avenger Cow
description: Kim the Avenger Cow is a fresh action side-scroller. You are Kim, a very unusual and angry cow. Defeat your enemies with unlimited squirts of acid milk! Discover what's behind the evil dairy industry in this fast paced adventure, packed with a lot of minigames and wacky animations.

name: Idol Mystic Knightess Fyllia: Downfall Life Filled With Humiliation
Trial of Temptation
description:
Tales tell of the mythical Shrine of Fate, which resides at the bottom of the Steps of Determination, leading towards the Gong of Truth. However, those tales also describe a harrowing trial for any who approach the Shrine. 
Today, our main protagonist Ping Pe arrives at the Shrine, which he previously believed to be just some myth. Take control and uncover the secrets of this mysterious place.

name: Manga Kakeru
description: A PlayStation 4 and PlayStation Vita game where you can create manga.

name: View-Master TMNT VR
description: View-Master TMNT VR is a virtual reality mobile game based on the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles series.

name: 18 Classic Card Games
description: Play Texas Hold 'Em, Blackjack, Rummy, Hearts and many more classic card games on your Nintendo DS. Challenge up to 5 computer-controlled opponents -- bid your deck to max and take all the tricks in Skat, lay your cards down for a game of Solitaire, or make the bluff of your life in a hand of Poker. Step-by-step instructions are included for those who need to brush up on the rules. 18 Classic Card Games includes the following playing card games: Texas Hold 'Em • Omaha Hold 'Em • Casino Blackjack • Spanish Blackjack • Blackjack • Pontoon • Dutch Eenentwintigen • Rummy • Canasta • German Mau Mau • Dutch Pesten • Bridge • Dutch Klaverjassen • French Belote • German Skat • Freecell • Hearts • Klondike.

name: Beyblade: Burst God
description: Beyblade Burst God is an Action game, developed and published by FuRyu, which was released in Japan in 2017.

name: Jewel Quest Solitaire Trio
description: Love Solitaire? Jewel Quest Solitaire Trio brings together Jewel Quest Solitaire I, Jewel Quest Solitaire II and Jewel Quest Solitaire III all into one package! Enjoy Tri-peaks, Nester and Klondike with Jewel Quest jewel board mini games in between!

name: Solitaire Overload Plus
description: Solitaire Overload Plus sets a new standard for NDS games with its quality game content and play longevity that consumers should demand for their purchase dollars. SO+ continues our trend of releasing one-of-a-kind products that strongly appeal to the "brain games" and family niche.

name: 3 in 1: Solitaire, Mahjong, & Tangram
description: 3 in 1: Solitaire, Mahjong & Tangram is a Nintendo DS game that includes 707 unique game variations. The game includes Solitaire, Mahjong, and Tangram, plus 101 picture puzzles.

name: The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy: Freaky Freezeday
Cars: Lightning League
description:
Feel the thrill of high-octane sport racing in Disney•Pixar’s Cars: Lightning League!
Blindsided by a new generation of blazing-fast racers, the legendary Lightning McQueen is suddenly pushed out of the sport he loves. To get back in the game, help train the Piston Cup champ in iconic film locations as he prepares for a speedy comeback in this all-new game inspired by Disney•Pixar’s “Cars 3.” Race fast, race smart, and prove to the world that it’s not over until lightning strikes!

name: Toy Story: Smash It!
description:
The Toys are back! Join Buzz, Woody, and the rest of the Disney Pixar "Toy Story" gang on their latest adventure!
"Toy Story: Smash it!" is an all-new, 3D physics-based puzzle game featuring your favorite "Toy Story" characters! Embark on new adventures with the Toys through hilarious encounters in outer space, alien chases in the Wild West, and more! With 90 levels of nonstop puzzle play, this game will provide hours of explosive and thrilling fun!

name: Cars: Fast as Lightning
description: Cars: Fast as Lightning is a fun, family racing game starring Lightning McQueen and his piston-powered pals.

name: Segare Ijiri
description: In Segare Ijiri, the player takes control of a young boy with an arrow-size head that her mother (a giraffe) send him through a strange world to make him learn different things.

name: Zoku Segare Ijiri
description: Zoku Segare Ijiri is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Enix Corporation, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Head on N
description:
Head On N is an arcade video game released by Nintendo in 1979. The game is a licensed clone of Sega's arcade game Head On.

Head On N is a maze game in a similar vein to Pac-Man that has the player controlling a car, collecting dots and avoiding the other cars in the maze in order not to crash (the other cars act as the ghosts from Pac-Man).

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 92: The Noroi no Game
description: The Noroi no Game is an Adventure game, developed by HuneX and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Hidden Object: Home for the Holidays
Veins
description: Renovate homes with your friends in this radical fast paced organ-based physics defying multiplayer refurbishing experience!

name: Puzzle Maniacs
description: Puzzle Maniacs is a low budget jugsaw puzzles game.

name: Vitamin X Destination
description: A title designed for the 10th anniversary of the Vitamin series.

name: Vitamin Z Revolution
description: Full on the box art title: "Vitamin Z Revolution: New Supplement Boys goes over".

name: Vitamin X to Z
description: Full on the box art title: "Vitamin X to Z: All Supplement Boys have become complete".

name: Vitamin X Detective B6
description: A alternate universe spin off of Vitamin X.

name: Party Carnival
description: A collection of 38 simple yet addictive mini-games that will probe your mind and get your nerves standing on end!

name: Billiard Action
description:
- Lets start a new game!
- Up to four players can take part at the same time.
- Place a bet on the shot result before a player shoots!

name: 1000 Cooking Recipes from Elle à Table
description: In 1000 Cooking Recipes from Elle à Table is a game where you are able to put together your own course of dishes chosen from 1000 tempting recipes. You can pick from recommendations as well as create your own recipes and share with your friends and family.

name: Vitamin Y
description: Minigames with characters from Vitamin X series. Full on the box art title: "Vitamin Y: Super Supplement Minigames with B6 & T6".

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 30: The Table Game
description:
Includes rule explanations so even beginners can dive right in!

Rules and how-tos are included for each game. It's perfect for anyone, whether you're a brand new player or a veteran that needs a brush up.

name: Hidden Object: Ghost of Misty Shore
Simple DS Series Vol.16: The Sagasou - Fushigi na Konchuu no Mori
Simple DS Series Vol. 40: The Gekai
SuperStar SMTown
description: SuperStar SMTOWN is a rhythm game which features songs by the various music artists in South Korean entertainment company, SM Entertainment.

name: Puzzgun
description: PuzzGun is a retro styled puzzle solving platformer where the player needs to make their way through 63 brainteasingly hilarious stages spread across three different worlds.

name: Helicopter Flight Simulator
description: Control helicopters and become a part of a true rescue team! Rescue and evacuate people, fight the fires, and complete other dangerous missions. That's your chance not only to become a rescuer but also master piloting skills. Be ready for takeoff!

name: Amaze Classic
description: Amaze Classic is a straightforward and surprisingly - difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with abstraction art and calm soundtrack.

name: Shark
description: In the game Shark you control the shark, which should eat orange plankton to evolve. Do not fall into the fishing nets and dodge the flying harpoons in you! And do not try to swallow an underwater mine, it will also kill you!

name: Dirt Bike Insanity
description: It's a racing game that takes you into the world of motocross - Dirt Bikes.

name: SingStar: Fussballhits
description: SingStar: Fussballhits is a karaoke game, featuring popular soccer songs. The game gives points which are distributed by the purity of singing, as in how well does one manage to stay on tune. It does not matter if you change octaves in the middle of the song or what words are you singing in as it does not have word recognition, so your singing is rated by how well you manage to hit the correct note at the correct time.

name: Hazard
description: The Evil King lives again and the world must once again face up to this great evil... A wanderer with nothing to lose, you are the hero of this tale of Warriors, Sorcerers, Courage, Love, Death, Demons and Monsters. You must rid the land of all that is Evil and restore the peace to the Kingdom.

name: Overturn: Final Operation
description:
After the down of Beholder, Magi is left alone and since the final fight, she lost all her abilities and is unable to fight anymore.
Enemies are still coming and they shows no sign of stopping...
It’s terrifying to see that there are still a huge number of enemies even many of them have been defeated before. The enemies surround MAGI and come to get her.

Thought this is the end, Magi is giving up slowly, but all of a sudden unknown Androids come and fight the enemies.
Startled, Magi looks at them. She has no idea of who they are and where they come from. But one thing that she knows, the androids are sent to protect and rescue her.

MagiI uses the very last of her power and makes an attempt to escape with the help of the Androids.

name: Frightened Beetles
description: Something terrible happened in the forest! Someone frightened all Bugs! What happened? You are the only one who can find it out!
